author: minfrin
msg: Add apr_escape_ldap() and apr_pescape_ldap(), escaping characters
as described by RFC4514 and RFC4515 respectively.

author: jross
msg: QPID-5714: Skip python tests if test code is missing

author: kiwiwings
msg: - don't rely on SecretKey object having the right algorithm set
- leave encryption-description parsing of string/stream to xmlbeans and refactor it to one location
- use namespaces of schema instead of hard-coded strings
- use CryptoFunctions.getMessageDigest() instead of code duplication
